name: Zombie Sniper Fighter
description:
Super Zombie Crush: Crazy Shooting Fighter.
A crazy zombie shooting game during this year, extremely thrilling and grand battle scenes!
Zombie snappy shooting is an amazing FPS game on market!
Just take up your weapon and kill the evil zombies as much as possible!
Save the beautiful girls from the enemy and enjoy the fierce shoot feeling.
Many missions to complete and Abundant weapons you can switch!
Fluent scene and exciting game.
Features
Muti-Roles to switch, like steel man and Tai Chi Man.
Many weapons to change.
Action game with fluent scenes.
bloody cool scenes
Many missions to complete

I am sure you will love this action game and do not forget give us a five star.
Thank you very much!
